import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Navbar } from "../index"; import "./Claim.css"; class Complaints extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { step: 1, claim_ID: "", claim_username: "", claim_userSSID: "", claim_usertel: "", claim_email: "", claim_copyIDImage: [], producttype: "0", claim_parcelID: "", claim_des: "", claim_ReceiptImage: [], claim_DamageImage: [], claim_bankaccount: "0", bankAccount: "0", claim_banknum: "", claim_bankholdername: "", claim_bookbank:"" }; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange = (input, e) => { this.setState({ [input]: e.target.value }); }; handleBankChange = (input, e) => { if (input === "claim_bankaccount") { const value = e.target.value; if (value === "6") { this.setState({ [input]: value, bankaccount: "" }); } else { this.setState({ [input]: value }); } } else { this.setState({ [input]: e.target.value }); } }; handleFileChange = (e) => { const selectedFiles = e.target.files; const updatedFiles = []; for (let i = 0; i < selectedFiles.length; i++) { updatedFiles.push(selectedFiles[i]); } this.setState({ files: updatedFiles }); }; // Function to navigate to next step nextStep = () => { const { step } = this.state; this.setState({ step: step + 1, }); }; // Function to navigate to previous step prevStep = () => { const { step } = this.state; this.setState({ step: step - 1, }); }; handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Form submitted:", this.state); // Fetch URL to your backend API const url = "http://localhost:3333/Claim"; // Update the URL as per your backend endpoint // Prepare the form data const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("claim_ID", this.state.claim_ID); formData.append("claim_username", this.state.claim_username); formData.append("claim_userSSID",this.state.claim_userSSID); formData.append("claim_usertel",this.state.claim_usertel); formData.append("claim_email",this.state.claim_email); formData.append("claim_copyIDImage",this.state.claim_copyIDImage); formData.append("claim_parcelID",this.state.claim_parcelID); formData.append("claim_des",this.state.claim_des); formData.append("claim_ReceiptImage",this.state.claim_ReceiptImage); formData.append("claim_DamageImage",this.state.claim_DamageImage); formData.append("claim_bankaccount",this.state.claim_bankaccount); formData.append("claim_banknum",this.state.claim_banknum); formData.append("claim_bankholdername",this.state.claim_bankholdername); formData.append("claim_bookbank",this.state.claim_bookbank); // Append other form fields as needed // Append files this.state.files.forEach((file, index) => { formData.append(`file${index}`, file); }); // Make a POST request to the backend using Axios axios .post(url, formData) .then((response) => { console.log("Success:", response.data); // Handle success response }) .catch((error) => { console.error("Error:", error); // Handle error }); }; render() { const { step, claim_ID, claim_username, claim_userSSID, claim_usertel, claim_email, claim_copyIDImage, claim_type, claim_parcelID, claim_des, claim_ReceiptImage, claim_DamageImage, claim_bankaccount, bankAccount, claim_banknum, claim_bankholdername, claim_bookbank } = this.state; return ( <>

this.handleChange("claim_username", e)} placeholder="Name of Claiment" />
this.handleChange("claim_userSSID", e)} placeholder="Thai ID/Passport" />
this.handleChange("claim_usertel", e)} placeholder="Phone Number" />
this.handleChange("claim_email", e)} placeholder="Email" />

this.handleChange("claim_parcelID", e)} placeholder="Tracking No." />
this.handleChange("claim_des", e)} placeholder="Desciption." />
*(Required if Damage)

{claim_bankaccount === "6" && (
this.handleChange("claim_bankaccount", e) } placeholder="Name of Bank" />
)}
this.handleChange("claim_banknum", e)} placeholder="Bank Account Number" />
this.handleChange("claim_bankholdername", e) } placeholder="Full Name of Account Holder" />

)}
); } } export default Complaints;
